name: Internet Cafe Business Tycoon
description: Start from scratch as a startup, and get to know how to make your business really profitable. Raise your sales, upgrade the hardware. Create a comfortable workplace for every team in your cafe. This Internet cafe job simulator game gives you an opportunity to create your own gaming cafe, starting from one computer, after some time you will have several rooms, filled with gamers. So get ready to manage your own internet cafe.
